<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>public</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.HealthMontorGlobalUtils</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description/>
        <name>HealthMontorGlobalUtils</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var HealthMontorGlobalUtils = Class.create();
HealthMontorGlobalUtils.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {
    },

	insertGlobalRecord: function (gr) {
        return gr.insert();
    },
    
	updateGlobalRecord: function (gr) {
        return gr.update();
    },

    deleteGlobalRecord: function (gr) {
        gr.deleteRecord();
    },
	
	
	setWorkflowFalseUpdate: function (gr) {
        gr.setWorkflow(false);
        return gr.update();
    },

    setWorkflowFalseInsert: function (gr) {
        gr.setWorkflow(false);
        return gr.insert();
    },

    setWorkflowTrueUpdate: function (gr) {
        gr.setWorkflow(true);
        return gr.update();
    },

    setWorkflowTrueInsert: function (gr) {
        gr.setWorkflow(true);
        return gr.insert();
    },
	
    type: 'HealthMontorGlobalUtils'
};]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>mmoody</sys_created_by>

        <sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>

</record_update>
